name: VersionWriterTask
description: Override the <Version> tag value project file.
author: Jedusoft

inputs.name: searchPattern
inputs.label: Path to csproj/vbproj file
inputs.helpMarkDown: Pattern to use for finding the Project file.

inputs.name: versionValue
inputs.label: New version value
inputs.helpMarkDown: Represents the new version value. It is possible to use 3 to 4 digits (x.y.z or x.y.z.p). the value of the field takes into consideration the environment variables. To avoid replacing the value of a digit, simply put "_". example: 5 ._. $ (Build.BuildId). The first digit will be replaced by 5, the second digit will be ignored, and the third will be replaced by the value of the environment variable $ (Build.BuildId).
